document_data.name: Tavaray
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tavaray''' (or the '''Free City of Tavaray''') was a [[human]] settlement on the later site of the [[Lizard Marsh]] at the mouth of the [[River Delimbiyr]]. It was established in {{Yearlink|-50}} by settlers from [[Ruathym]].<ref name=tGHotR-p59> This sparked a wave of settlement along the [[Sword Coast North]].{{Cite dungeon/73/Eye of Myrkul}}

It was abandoned in [[302 DR]],<ref name=tGHotR-p69> prompting a wave of migration northward along the coast and eastward up the lower [[Delimbiyr Vale]].<ref name=tGHotR-p69>
